channel.title: Mustang Car Club of Colorado
channel.description: Recent content on Mustang Car Club of Colorado

item.title: About Us
item.description: The Mustang Car Club of Colorado promotes the intrest of preservation, restoration, and recreational enjoyment of the Ford Mustang Automobile. We welcome ALL years of Mustangs! Club Motto Friendship, Adventure, Style - A legacy continues. General Information Club Application* Click the join us. Fill out the applciation Print the completed form. Please make checks payable to: Mustang Car Club of Colorado Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

Mustang Car Club of Colorado Bylaws Article 1: Name The name of the club is the Mustang Car Club of Colorado, herein after referred to as MCCC or the Club. The Club shall operate as a 501c 7 Non-profit Corporation and shall maintain this status according to IRS requirements/regulations. Article 2: Purpose and Objectives Section 1 The purpose of the Mustang Car Club of Colorado is to provide non-profit recreation for the club members, centered around the Ford Mustang (all years) and all other Ford powered vehicles.
